alert.note: Alert for Eastern Teton (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:55PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Teton County through 530 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Fairfield, or 14 miles southeast of Choteau, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dutton, Power and Collins. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 305 and 321. Highway 89 between mile markers 29 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
